text:
Was working on a site today and came up with this idea/suggestion for having the ability to make sections smart or use smart rules to be able to hide entire sections. Feel free to add your use cases to it as comments if you think of more!
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Ability-to-have-Smart-Sections-or-hide-sections-based-on-Smart/idi-p/353633#M60734>
